data.title: Why do Malaysian Chinese face discrimination in government jobs and positions in Malaysia?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 6): The first finance minister of Malaya after independence from Brits was Tan Siew Sin who was either son or grandson of Sir Tan Cheng Lock the eminent entrepreneur and leader of Chinese community who later made as director of Gutherie the biggest rubber plantation company owned by ...
